name: Gnome Workshop: Repair Edition
description:
Player One:

WASD: Move

Q: Roll Dices

E: Select Gnome

R: Spawn Gnome

Player Two:

IJKL: Move

U: Roll Dices

O: Select Gnome

P: Spawn Gnome

If your Gnome  falls on other player's gnome, draws  that gnome back to its bench.

If your gnome falls on Dices Square, roll again.

If your gnome is on Defense Square, it can´t be removed.

You win if all your 7 Gnomes complete the bird house.

This game was done as part of Global Game Jam 2020.
